value:
Astra is an Isaach technique passed
down from the Sword Saint Od. This
attire should help me hone it further.

Prince Shannan is not attending the
festival, so I must protect Lord Seliph
in his stead!

I'm well-rested and got plenty to
eat—perfect conditions to go out
and best any opponent!

I like my clothes as light as possible,
since it's easier to move in, but I can
make an exception for the festival.

I wonder if the crusaders' original
armor still exists...$k$pAfter all, we still have Balmung and
the other weapons, right?

Come enjoy the Jugdral-themed
festivities at the castle of your
friend $Nf!

My blade is the twinkle of a star... I
will drive back the dark with the Astra
I inherited from the Sword Saint Od!

Attack, then follow up... I won't
forgive anyone who tries to disrupt
the festival!

Huh? No, I feel fine... I just need to
try harder.

You want to see what I can do?
I suppose I have no choice then.

My name is Larcei, and I vow on the
name of Od the Sword Saint to take
first place at the festival tournament!

Seeing the sword masters of other
worlds, I've realized that, even in this
outfit, my legs are still powerful tools.$k$pThe air of the battlefield, my foe's
intent to kill...I can feel it on my skin.
And then my legs carry me forward!$k$pI might not know exactly what the
Sword Saint Od wore, but I'm certain
he felt the same way.$k$pHe probably used his legs to step
forward without hesitation—just like
this! And...also just like my mother...$k$pEven though I was never able to meet
the person her allies knew... I'd like to
live up to those memories of her.
たあっ
甘い！
きゃあっ…
この程度…！
You won't escape!
Don't treat me like a child!
Sword Saint Od!
You've already lost!
I needed...more training...
Hehe
Today is the festival! Don't worry, I'll make sure you have fun.
Ugh, you need to calm down.
In our land, the crusaders are greatly admired to this day.
I refuse to become an embarrassment to Sword Saint Od... That's why I need to keep sharpening my skills!
Hmm, I wonder if I can master this weapon... No, I WILL master it!
The festival to honor the crusaders... I wish my mother were here to enjoy it with me.
Did you enjoy the festival? I'm glad you could learn more about where I come from.
I'm ready.
Let's get going.
I won't fail!
